name: about Smarters Pro
description: IPTV Smarters Pro is one of the Best IPTV Players. We have the most stable high quality internet TV Platform in the world – less downtime, buffering, freezing, and picture break-up, and more consistent high quality ‘TV over the internet’, and we are prepared to prove it!

name: F-HD IPTV Channls
description: We provide high resolution channels 1080p, 720p and 480p to get best enjoy for our customers! with Features of Catch Up & EPG (Electronic Program Guide) for all Channels
